135struct gnuplt_Data {
136 double x;
137 double y1;
138 double y2;
139 double y3;
140};
141
146typedef std::vector<gnuplt_Data> gnuplt_Dataset;
147
148namespace gnuplotio {
149 template<>
150 struct TextSender<gnuplt_Data> {
159 static void send(std::ostream &stream, const gnuplt_Data &v) {
160 stream << " ";
161 TextSender<double>::send(stream, v.x);
162 stream << " ";
163 TextSender<double>::send(stream, v.y1);
164 stream << " ";
165 TextSender<double>::send(stream, v.y2);
166 stream << " ";
167 TextSender<float>::send(stream, v.y3);
168 }
169 };
170}
